summary: This amulet was used by Talos himself while he learned the Way of the Voice. The amulet gives one a power to use thu\'um indefinitely.
descriptionHtml:
Can be found in Tomb of Ysgramor, on the feet of the statue.
Gives you 20 points of armor, light armor.
Completely reduces the cooldown times on shouts.
Inspired by Revakriid character build by Teccam: 
http://theskyrimblog.ning.com/group/character-building/forum/topics/character-build-the-revakriid

INSTALLATION:
Drop the .esp file in your Skyrim directory\'s Data files.

I give the permission to use this as a resource, but please don\'t upload this file elsewhere
author: JulQri
